title: Dashboard loads correctly with key statistics and charts
description: Verify that the Dashboard page loads without errors and displays all key statistics, capacity and distribution charts, and calendar overview correctly with dynamic data.

steps.description: Navigate to the Dashboard page after login
Check the Dashboard displays system metrics such as total orders, inventory counts, bookings summary
Verify the Capacity Chart is rendered and populated with correct data
Verify the Distribution Chart is rendered and populated correctly
Confirm Calendar overview is displayed with current and upcoming events

title: Order Management bulk update and modal interactions
description: Test creating, editing, and performing bulk operations in Order Management including opening modals for notes, reminders and attachments.

steps.description: Navigate to the Order Management page
Create a new order using the OrderFormModal and save
Verify the new order appears in the orders data grid
Select multiple orders and perform a bulk update operation
Verify the selected orders are updated accordingly
Open a row modal to add a note to an existing order
Save the note and close the modal
Confirm the note is visible in the corresponding order's details

title: Booking system multi-VIN appointment scheduling and calendar accuracy
description: Verify booking of appointments involving multiple VINs, and the calendar updates in real time to reflect bookings and booking history in the sidebar.

steps.description: Navigate to the Booking page
Schedule a new appointment involving multiple VINs using the BookingCalendarGrid
Ensure the appointment is shown correctly on the calendar with all associated VINs
View booking history in the BookingSidebar
Confirm booking history shows recent appointments accurately
Modify the appointment and verify calendar updates immediately
Check the updated appointment details reflect correctly on the calendar and sidebar

title: Main Sheet inventory status handling and sheet locking workflow
description: Test inventory entries status updates and workflow controls including locking and unlocking the main sheet.

steps.description: Navigate to the Main Sheet Inventory page
Change the status of multiple inventory items
Verify inventory items' statuses update correctly
Lock the Main Sheet to prevent changes
Confirm the sheet is locked and no edits are possible
Unlock the Main Sheet
Verify edits are possible again after unlocking

title: Call List tracking and call status updating
description: Ensure the Call List correctly displays ongoing calls related to orders and allows updating call statuses from the UI.

steps.description: Navigate to the Call List page
Verify the ongoing calls are listed with correct details
Update the status of a call record
Verify the call status updates properly and reflects immediately

title: Archive module viewing and reorder functionality
description: Test the ability to view archived records and reorder them back into active Orders without data loss.

steps.description: Navigate to the Archive module
Verify historical records are displayed correctly
Select a record and initiate reorder back to Orders
Confirm the record moves back to active Orders with data intact

title: Data Grid sorting, filtering, dynamic editing and custom rendering
description: Validate that the reusable data grid supports sorting, filtering, dynamic inline editing and displays custom cell renderers as expected.

steps.description: Open any page with AG Grid based data grid
Apply sorting on multiple columns
Verify rows reorder according to sorting
Apply filters to narrow down displayed rows
Verify filtered rows display correctly
Edit a cell inline and submit changes
Confirm that changes persist and reflect correctly
Verify custom renderers display specialized content (e.g. badges, icons) appropriately

title: Global Search returns cross-domain accurate results
description: Test Global Search functionality by querying VINs, customers, parts, and companies and verify results reflect across respective UI components.

steps.description: Input search query into the Global Search input
Verify search results include relevant VINs, customers, part numbers and companies
Confirm results appear categorized correctly in the Search Results Grid
Select a search result and verify the correct detailed data view loads

title: Settings Modal persistence and effect on system behavior
description: Verify that changes made in the Settings Modal for part statuses, appearance, booking status, and history persist after closing and affect behavior across the app.

steps.description: Open the Settings Modal
Modify part statuses, appearance theme, booking statuses, and history options
Save settings and close the modal
Verify settings changes persist after reopening the modal
Check system behavior reflects changes, e.g., new part statuses available, theme updates, booking status modifications

title: Notification system badges and direct navigation
description: Test that the notification system displays correct badges for alerts, enables direct navigation to affected items, and auto-scrolls to the alert source in the UI.

steps.description: Generate or receive notifications in the system
Verify badges show correct notification counts on Header and Sidebar
Click on a notification badge or alert
Confirm navigation jumps directly to the related data entry and auto-scrolls into view

title: Row Modals for inline editing of notes, reminders, attachments
description: Validate that users can open row-level modals to edit notes, reminders, and attachments within data grids and that changes save correctly.

steps.description: Open a data grid and select a row to open its Row Modal
Edit the note, add a reminder, and upload an attachment within the modal
Save changes and close the modal
Verify that changes appear immediately in the grid row and persist after reload

title: Automatic workflow moves VINs to Call List when parts arrive
description: Test the auto-move workflow that triggers moving VINs to the Call List when all parts have arrived and parts status updates accordingly.

steps.description: Update parts status to 'arrived' for a VIN in the inventory
Verify the VIN is automatically moved to the Call List
Confirm call status monitoring reflects the new VIN in the Call List

title: Application state consistency with Zustand slices
description: Ensure state management using Zustand slices maintains consistent application state across sessions, components, and tabs when actions are performed.

steps.description: Perform actions that modify state such as updating orders, changing bookings, or modifying settings in one tab
Open the application in a second tab or reload the first tab
Verify the state updates are consistent and reflected across tabs and components
Confirm no state corruption or loss occurs during normal use

title: Error handling for invalid data input in Order Management
description: Test the system's handling of invalid inputs in order forms and bulk updates to ensure appropriate validation messages appear and errors are gracefully handled.

steps.description: Navigate to Order Management and attempt to create an order with invalid or missing mandatory fields
Verify validation error messages appear and form submission is blocked
Try bulk updating orders with invalid data sets
Confirm errors are caught and the operation is either blocked or partially applied with warnings

title: UI responsiveness across devices and screen sizes
description: Verify that major UI pages including Dashboard, Order Management, and Booking system maintain usability and layout integrity on different screen resolutions and devices.

steps.description: Access the system on desktop, tablet, and mobile viewport sizes
Check that all UI components are visible, functional, and properly aligned in each viewport
Confirm no horizontal scrolling or layout breakages occur

title: Security: Verify access control for critical modules
description: Ensure only authenticated users can access sensitive features like Order Management, Archive module, and Settings Modal, and unauthorized access is blocked.

steps.description: Try to access protected routes/pages without logging in
Verify redirection to login page or access denied message
Login with a user without admin or privileged rights and try to access Settings Modal or Archive reorder
Confirm access restrictions apply according to user role

title: Reporting feature: Backup report scheduling and recipient management
description: Test the creation, scheduling, and recipient configuration of backup reports, and verify reports generate and send correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the Reporting section
Create a new backup report and schedule it for automatic generation
Add and remove recipients for report delivery
Verify the report generates on schedule and recipients receive the report
